verses.verse: (For the choir director. A Song. A Psalm.) Shout <S%H7321><s%> joyfully <S%H7321><s%> to God, <S%H430><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the earth; <S%H776><s%>
Sing <S%H2167><s%> the glory <S%H9202><s%> of His name; <S%H8034><s%> Make <S%H7760><s%> His praise <S%H8416><s%> glorious. <S%H9202><s%>

Say <S%H559><s%> to God, <S%H430><s%> "How <S%H4100><s%> awesome <S%H3372><s%> are Thy works! <S%H4639><s%> Because of the greatness <S%H7230><s%> of Thy power <S%H5797><s%> Thine enemies <S%H340><s%> will give <S%H3584><s%> feigned <S%H3584><s%> obedience <S%H3584><s%> to Thee.

"All <S%H3605><s%> the earth <S%H776><s%> will worship <S%H7812><s%> Thee, And will sing <S%H2167><s%> praises <S%H2167><s%> to Thee; They will sing <S%H2167><s%> praises <S%H2167><s%> to Thy name. <S%H8034><s%>" Selah. <S%H5542><s%>

Come <S%H1980><s%> and see <S%H7200><s%> the works <S%H9282><s%> of God, <S%H430><s%> [Who is] awesome <S%H3372><s%> in [His] deeds <S%H5949><s%> toward <S%H5921><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of men. <S%H120><s%>

He turned <S%H2015><s%> the sea <S%H3220><s%> into dry <S%H3004><s%> land; <S%H3004><s%> They passed <S%H5674><s%> through the river <S%H5104><s%> on foot; <S%H7272><s%> There <S%H8033><s%> let us rejoice <S%H8055><s%> in Him!

He rules <S%H4910><s%> by His might <S%H1369><s%> forever; <S%H5703><s%> His eyes <S%H5869><s%> keep <S%H6822><s%> watch <S%H6822><s%> on the nations; <S%H1471><s%> Let not the rebellious <S%H5637><s%> exalt <S%H7311><s%> themselves. Selah. <S%H5542><s%>
Bless <S%H1288><s%> our God, <S%H430><s%> O peoples, <S%H5971><s%> And sound <S%H8085><s%> <S%H6963><s%> His praise <S%H8416><s%> abroad,
Who keeps <S%H7760><s%> us in life, <S%H9132><s%> And does not allow <S%H5414><s%> our feet <S%H7272><s%> to slip. <S%H4131><s%>
For Thou hast tried <S%H974><s%> us, O God; <S%H430><s%> Thou hast refined <S%H6884><s%> us as silver <S%H3701><s%> is refined. <S%H6884><s%>
Thou didst bring <S%H935><s%> us into the net; <S%H9287><s%> Thou didst lay <S%H7760><s%> an oppressive <S%H4157><s%> burden <S%H4157><s%> upon our loins. <S%H4975><s%>

Thou didst make men <S%H582><s%> ride <S%H7392><s%> over our heads; <S%H7218><s%> We went <S%H935><s%> through fire <S%H784><s%> and through water; <S%H4325><s%> Yet Thou didst bring <S%H3318><s%> us out into [a place of] abundance. <S%H7310><s%>
I shall come <S%H935><s%> into Thy house <S%H1004><s%> with burnt <S%H5930><s%> offerings; <S%H5930><s%> I shall pay <S%H9608><s%> Thee my vows, <S%H5088><s%>
Which <S%H834><s%> my lips <S%H8193><s%> uttered <S%H6475><s%> And my mouth <S%H6310><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> when I was in distress. <S%H9496><s%>

I shall offer <S%H5927><s%> to Thee burnt <S%H5930><s%> offerings <S%H5930><s%> of fat <S%H4220><s%> beasts, <S%H4220><s%> With the smoke <S%H7004><s%> of rams; <S%H352><s%> I shall make <S%H6213><s%> [an offering of] bulls <S%H1241><s%> with male <S%H6260><s%> goats. <S%H6260><s%> Selah. <S%H5542><s%>

Come <S%H1980><s%> [and] hear, <S%H8085><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> who fear <S%H3372><s%> God, <S%H430><s%> And I will tell <S%H5608><s%> of what <S%H834><s%> He has done <S%H6213><s%> for my soul. <S%H5315><s%>
I cried <S%H7121><s%> to Him with my mouth, <S%H6310><s%> And He was extolled <S%H7311><s%> with my tongue. <S%H3956><s%>
If <S%H518><s%> I regard <S%H7200><s%> wickedness <S%H205><s%> in my heart, <S%H3820><s%> The Lord <S%H136><s%> will not hear; <S%H8085><s%>
But certainly <S%H403><s%> God <S%H430><s%> has heard; <S%H8085><s%> He has given <S%H7181><s%> heed <S%H7181><s%> to the voice <S%H6963><s%> of my prayer. <S%H8605><s%>
Blessed <S%H1288><s%> be God, <S%H430><s%> Who <S%H834><s%> has not turned <S%H5493><s%> away <S%H5493><s%> my prayer, <S%H8605><s%> Nor <S%H3808><s%> His lovingkindness <S%H2617><s%> from me.
